scripts.build:functions: npm run build:database  && npm i --workspace=packages/functions && npm run build --workspace=packages/functions
scripts.build:client: npm run build:interfaces && npm i --workspace=packages/client && npm run build --workspace=packages/client
scripts.build:database: npm run build:interfaces && npm i --workspace=packages/database && npm run build --workspace=packages/database
scripts.build:api: npm run build:database && npm i --workspace=packages/api && npm run build --workspace=packages/api
scripts.clean: npm run clean:functions; npm run clean:interfaces; npm run clean:indexes; npm run clean:client; npm run clean:api; npm run clean:database; rm -rf node_modules
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean; npm run build
